name: Sethos
desc:
"Wisdom's Measure" Sethos

A visitor from the sea of sand, profound in providence.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
The opposing active character gains <color=#ffacff>Electro Application</color> , and you switch to your next character. Attach <color=#ffffff>Thunder Convergence</color> to self.
<color=#ece5d8>Thunder Convergence</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After your characters trigger</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro-Related Reactions</color> : The attached character gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> . Attaches <color=#ffffff>Twilight Meditation</color> to self.
<color=#ece5d8>Twilight Meditation</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached used a Normal Attack:</color> <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt is converted to <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , DMG +1, <color=#ffffff>Unaligned Element</color> cost -1, and deal 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to the opposing character with the lowest HP.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
Character's own Normal Attacks will not generate <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> .
After performing a Normal Attack: If possible, consume all <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> and deal <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> equal to the amount consumed +1 to the enemy with the lowest HP.

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ffacff>Electro-Related Reactions</color>
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] Electro Crystallize: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] Electro Swirl: Deal 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ffacff>Electro Application</color>
When Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : The target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : No effect
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : No effect
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : Creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
<color=#ece5d8>Unaligned Element</color>
You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc:
"Wisdom's Measure" Sethos

A visitor from the sea of sand, profound in providence.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"So you wanna play cards? No problem. It just so happens a certain someone recently pulled me aside and taught me the rules. This'll be a good opportunity to try."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Sethos's deck revolves around Energy and Normal Attacks, and is effective at dealing Piercing DMG to characters on standby.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc:
"Wisdom's Measure" Sethos

A visitor from the sea of sand, profound in providence.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc:
"Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney

Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?

customize.name: Dori
customize.desc:
"Treasure of Dream Garden" Dori

The Mora, the merrier!

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc:
"Wisdom's Measure" Sethos

A visitor from the sea of sand, profound in providence.

customize.name: Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple
customize.desc:

"Glory to Al-Ahmar!"

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple
customize.desc:
Sethos: Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple

"Glory to Al-Ahmar!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I wasn't expecting you to be this good! Alright, I guess it's time to get serious!"
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Sethos" starts with the Talent Card "Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: Sethos
